macros.macro: msg 'All Follow Me';

@removelist 'killables';@createlist 'killables';@pushlist 'killables' 0x28 // Balron;//@pushlist 'killables' 0xf1 // Oni;@pushlist 'killables' 0x2e // Ancient Wyrm;if followers == 5 and mounted 'self';useobject 'self';pause 25;endif;@cleartargetqueue;msg 'All Kill' 65;for 0 in 'killables';if @findtype killables[] 'any' 'world' 1 10;headmsg 'kill' 65 'found';@target 'found';stop;endif;endfor;
msg 'All Guard Me';

@removelist 'instruments';@createlist 'instruments';@pushlist 'instruments' 0xeb1 //Standing Harp;@pushlist 'instruments' 0xeb2 //Lap Harp;@pushlist 'instruments' 0xeb3 //Lute;@pushlist 'instruments' 0xe9c //Drum;@pushlist 'instruments' 0xe9d //Tambourine;@pushlist 'instruments' 0xe9e //Tambourine with red tassle;useskill 'Discordance';pause 500;if @injournal "What Instrument";@usetype 0xeb2 'any' 'backpack';@clearjournal;endif;
//if @getenemy 'criminal' 'gray' 'closest';@headmsg '[Target]' 44 'enemy';//@setalias 'last' 'enemy';useskill 'Animal Taming';waitfortarget 900;target 'last';//endif;
useskill 'Animal Lore';
cast "Arch Cure";
cast "Invisibility";
if @findtype '0xe21' 'any' 'backpack' 'any';useobject 'found';
useskill 'Peacemaking';

msg 'Vendor Buy Bank Guards';//waitforgump 0xf3ed3 1000;//waitforgump 0xf3eeb 1000;//replygump 0xf3ed3 107;//waitfortarget 1200;@removelist 'loot';@createlist 'loot';@pushlist 'loot' 0xeed // Gold;@pushlist 'loot' 0xf10 // Emerald;@pushlist 'loot' 0xf18 // Tourmaline;@pushlist 'loot' 0xf15 // Citrine;@pushlist 'loot' 0xf25 // Amber;@pushlist 'loot' 0xf16 // Amethyst;@pushlist 'loot' 0xf26 // Diamond;@pushlist 'loot' 0xf0f // Star Sapphire;@pushlist 'loot' 0xf11 // Sapphire;@pushlist 'loot' 0xf13 // Ruby;@pushlist 'loot' 0x1081 // Leather (Barbed);if @findtype 0xe76 '2498' 'backpack';@setalias 'lootbag' 'found';@headmsg 'lootbag' 65 'lootbag';@useobject 'lootbag';if @findtype 0xe75 '576' 'bank';@setalias 'dumpbag' 'found';@headmsg 'dumpbag' 65 'dumpbag';// Now dump loots.;for 0 in 'loot';while @findtype loot[] 'any' 'lootbag';@sysmsg 'Dumping Loot..' 65;@moveitem 'found' 'dumpbag';pause 690;endwhile;endfor;endif;endif;
if @getenemy 'murderer' 'criminal' 'gray' 'nearest';@headmsg '[Target]' 44 'enemy';@setalias 'last' 'enemy';endif;

@clearjournal;if @findtype '0xf6c' 'any' 'world' 1 2;headmsg 'Entering Moongate!' 65;useobject 'found';pause 320;if @injournal 'You must wait to perform' 'system';pause 450;useobject 'found';endif;waitforgump 0x232d 4500;replygump 0x232d 1;else;headmsg 'Found no moongate..' 65;endif;

// Rune is in blue runebook 2124.;// The rune is in the third to last slot.;headmsg 'GTFO Bank!' 65;if @findtype 0x22c5 2124 'backpack';useobject 'found';waitforgump 0x59 1000;replygump 0x59 64;endif;
cast "Teleport";

if not @timerexists 'blesstimer';@createtimer 'blesstimer';@settimer 'blesstimer' 0;endif;@removelist 'subjects';@createlist 'subjects';@pushlist 'subjects' 0x2506841 // Nightmare;@pushlist 'subjects' 0x300ae73 // Nightmare (ian);@pushlist 'subjects' 0x49a34cd // Giant Beetle;@pushlist 'subjects' 0x4acad41 // A wolf spider;@pushlist 'subjects' 0x320cc85 //;while not dead 'self';for 0 in 'subjects';if not @inrange subjects[] 10;continue;endif;if skill 'Magery' > 70;if poisoned subjects[];cast "Arch Cure";waitfortarget 1200;@target subjects[] 1500;elseif diffhits subjects[] > 35;cast "Greater Heal";waitfortarget 1250;@target subjects[] 1550;elseif skill 'Evaluating Intelligence' > 80;if @timer 'blesstimer' > 60000;cast 'Bless';waitfortarget 1200;@target subjects[] 1500;settimer 'blesstimer' 0;endif;endif;pause 400;endif;endfor;endwhile;

@createtimer 'drop';@settimer 'drop' 1000;@removelist 'food';@createlist 'food';@pushlist 'food' 0x // Muffins;@clearignorelist;for 0 in 'food';while @findtype food[] 'any' 'backpack';moveitemoffset 'found' 'ground' 0 1 0;pause 990;ignoreobject 'found';endwhile;endfor;

// Rune is in blue runebook 2124.;// The rune is in the third to last slot.;headmsg 'GTFO Stables!' 65;if @findtype 0x22c5 2124 'backpack';useobject 'found';waitforgump 0x59 1000;replygump 0x59 63;endif;

// Rune is in blue runebook 2124.;// The rune is in the third to last slot.;headmsg 'GTFO Innkeeper!' 65;if @findtype 0x22c5 2124 'backpack';useobject 'found';waitforgump 0x59 1000;replygump 0x59 62;endif;

// Rune is in blue runebook 2124.;// The rune is in the third to last slot.;headmsg 'GTFO Moongate/Luna!' 65;if @findtype 0x22c5 2124 'backpack';useobject 'found';waitforgump 0x59 1000;replygump 0x59 65;endif;

// Rune is in blue runebook 2124.;// The rune is in the third to last slot.;headmsg 'GTFO Bank!' 65;if @findtype 0x22c5 2124 'backpack';useobject 'found';waitforgump 0x59 1000;replygump 0x59 114;endif;

// Rune is in blue runebook 2124.;// The rune is in the third to last slot.;headmsg 'GTFO Luna Monongate!' 65;if @findtype 0x22c5 2124 'backpack';useobject 'found';waitforgump 0x59 1000;replygump 0x59 115;endif;

// Rune is in blue runebook 2124.;// The rune is in the third to last slot.;headmsg 'GTFO Innkeeper!' 65;if @findtype 0x22c5 2124 'backpack';useobject 'found';waitforgump 0x59 1000;replygump 0x59 112;endif;

// Rune is in blue runebook 2124.;// The rune is in the third to last slot.;headmsg 'GTFO Stables!' 65;if @findtype 0x22c5 2124 'backpack';useobject 'found';waitforgump 0x59 1000;replygump 0x59 113;endif;
while not dead 'self';if not hidden 'self';cast 'invisibility';waitfortarget 3500;target 'self' 1000;endif;endwhile;

//@removelist 'loot';if not listexists 'loot';@createlist 'loot';// Bear masks deer masks;@pushlist 'loot' 0x1545;@pushlist 'loot' 0x1547;// Hats / Helmets;@pushlist 'loot' 0x140b // Helmet;@pushlist 'loot' 0x1f0b;@pushlist 'loot' 0x140a;@pushlist 'loot' 0x2b6e;@pushlist 'loot' 0x1412;@pushlist 'loot' 0x140c;@pushlist 'loot' 0x13bb;@pushlist 'loot' 0x2b71;@pushlist 'loot' 0x1451;@pushlist 'loot' 0x1408;@pushlist 'loot' 0x2b72;@pushlist 'loot' 0x140e;@pushlist 'loot' 0x2b70;@pushlist 'loot' 0x1db9;@pushlist 'loot' 0x2b6f;@pushlist 'loot' 0x2b73;@pushlist 'loot' 0x1544;@pushlist 'loot' 0x1540;@pushlist 'loot' 0x1713;@pushlist 'loot' 0x1715;@pushlist 'loot' 0x1714;@pushlist 'loot' 0x1716;@pushlist 'loot' 0x1717;@pushlist 'loot' 0x1718;@pushlist 'loot' 0x1719;@pushlist 'loot' 0x171a;@pushlist 'loot' 0x171b;@pushlist 'loot' 0x171c;@pushlist 'loot' 0x2306;@pushlist 'loot' 0x2798 // Kasa;@pushlist 'loot' 0x2774 // Chainmail Hatsuburi;@pushlist 'loot' 0x2781 // Light Platemail Jingasa;// Jewelery;@pushlist 'loot' 0x1f06 // Bracelet;@pushlist 'loot' 0x1086 // Bracelet;@pushlist 'loot' 0x108a // Ring;@pushlist 'loot' 0x1f09 // Ring;// Arms;@pushlist 'loot' 0x277f // Platemail Hiro Sude;@pushlist 'loot' 0x13c5 // Leather Sleeves;@pushlist 'loot' 0x144e;@pushlist 'loot' 0x13ee;@pushlist 'loot' 0x13dc;@pushlist 'loot' 0x2b6c;@pushlist 'loot' 0x13cd;@pushlist 'loot' 0x2fc8;@pushlist 'loot' 0x2b77;@pushlist 'loot' 0x1410;// Legs;@pushlist 'loot' 0x278a // Mystic Leather Haidate;@pushlist 'loot' 0x2791 // Leather Ninja Pants;@pushlist 'loot' 0x2fc9;@pushlist 'loot' 0x13f0;@pushlist 'loot' 0x2fca;@pushlist 'loot' 0x2b78;@pushlist 'loot' 0x1411;@pushlist 'loot' 0x13be;@pushlist 'loot' 0x2b6b;@pushlist 'loot' 0x1452;@pushlist 'loot' 0x13cb;@pushlist 'loot' 0x13da;// Chest;@pushlist 'loot' 0x277d // Platemail Do;@pushlist 'loot' 0x277c // Studded Do;@pushlist 'loot' 0x13db // Studded Tunic;@pushlist 'loot' 0x13cc;@pushlist 'loot' 0x1415;@pushlist 'loot' 0x13bf;@pushlist 'loot' 0x13ec;@pushlist 'loot' 0x2b74;@pushlist 'loot' 0x2b67;@pushlist 'loot' 0x2fc5;@pushlist 'loot' 0x144f;// Neck;@pushlist 'loot' 0x13c7 // Leather Gorget;@pushlist 'loot' 0x2b69;@pushlist 'loot' 0x1413;@pushlist 'loot' 0x2fc7;@pushlist 'loot' 0x2b76;@pushlist 'loot' 0x13d6;// Gloves;@pushlist 'loot' 0x1414;@pushlist 'loot' 0x2b75;@pushlist 'loot' 0x13eb;@pushlist 'loot' 0x1450;@pushlist 'loot' 0x13d5;@pushlist 'loot' 0x2b6a;@pushlist 'loot' 0x2fc6;@pushlist 'loot' 0x13c6;endif;headmsg 'Select a container?' 65;@clearignorelist;@unsetalias 'cont';promptalias 'cont';@useobject 'cont';pause 710;for 0 in loot;while @findtype loot[] 'any' 'cont';waitforproperties 'found' 1200;if property 'Lower Reagent Cost' 'found' >= 20;headmsg '20% LRC';@moveitem 'found' 'backpack' 'cont';pause 690;if weight >= maxweight;headmsg 'Overweight!' 65;stop;endif;else;ignoreobject 'found';endif;endwhile;endfor;

// Ethereal Mounts;@removelist 'ethys';@createlist 'ethys';@pushlist 'ethys' 0x2d9c // Fallen;// Real Mounts;@removelist 'mounts';@createlist 'mounts';@pushlist 'mounts' 0x2506841 // Nightmare;@pushlist 'mounts' 0x5d70345 // Giant Beetle;@pushlist 'mounts' 0x34b9f75 // Cu;@pushlist 'mounts' 0x5445b1e // Hiryu;if mounted;useobject 'self';stop;endif;for 0 in 'mounts';if @findobject mounts[];if @inrange mounts[] 1;useobject 'found';else;msg 'All Follow Me' 65;endif;stop;endif;endfor;for 0 in 'ethys';if @findtype ethys[] 'any' 'backpack';useobject 'found';headmsg 'Mounting up!' 65;stop;endif;endfor;headmsg 'Already mounted? or cant find mount.' 65;

if not timerexists 'allkill';@createtimer 'allkill';endif;@removetimer 'bandage';@createtimer 'bandage';@settimer 'bandage' 0;@removetimer 'gift';@createtimer 'gift';@settimer 'gift' 0;@unsetalias 'target';@settimer 'allkill' 0;if @findtype 0x190 'any' 'world' 10;if @murderer 'found';@setalias 'target' 'found';else;promptalias 'target';endif;else;promptalias 'target';endif;@resync;whispermsg 'All Kill';waitfortarget 1000;@target 'target' 500;@removelist 'subjects';@createlist 'subjects';@pushlist 'subjects' 0x2506841 // Nightmare;@pushlist 'subjects' 0x300ae73 // Nightmare (ian);@pushlist 'subjects' 0x5d70345 // Giant Beetle;@pushlist 'subjects' 0x5445b1e // Lesser Hiryu;@pushlist 'subjects' 0x596bdc0 // Lesser Hiryu (ian);@pushlist 'subjects' 0x34b9f75 // a cu sidhe;while not dead 'self';for 0 in 'subjects';if @skill "veterinary" <= 105.0;@setskill "veterinary" "locked";endif;if @diffhits subjects[] > 99;if @inrange subjects[] 1;if @timer "bandage" > 5000;@headmsg 'Died -- Rezzing' 65 subjects[];@usetype 0xe21 'any' 'backpack';waitfortarget 800;@target subjects[] 800;pause 350;@settimer "bandage" 0;endif;endif;continue;endif;if timer 'allkill' > 6500 and @inrange 'target' 10;if @inrange subjects[] 1;whispermsg 'All Kill';waitfortarget 1000;@target 'target' 500;settimer 'allkill' 0;endif;endif;if not @inrange subjects[] 10;continue;endif;if @skill 'Spellweaving' > 70;if @diffhits subjects[] > 0;if @timer 'gift' > 120000;@cast 'Gift of Renewal';waitfortarget 4500;@target subjects[] 1500;pause 1000;@headmsg 'Gifted' 65 subjects[];@settimer 'gift' 0;endif;endif;endif;if skill 'Magery' > 70;if poisoned subjects[];cast "Arch Cure";waitfortarget 2500;@target subjects[] 1200;pause 1000;@headmsg 'Cured' 65 subjects[];elseif diffhits subjects[] > 13;cast "Greater Heal";waitfortarget 3500;@target subjects[] 1200;pause 500;@headmsg 'Healed' 65 subjects[];endif;pause 400;endif;endfor;endwhile;
cast "Greater Heal";

//edit mana on line two !;while not dead 'self';while paralyzed 'self';endwhile;while mana < 15;useskill 'meditation';pause 2500;endwhile;//Set Goal;if skill 'Meditation' == 100;stop;else;cast 'Mana Vampire';waitfortarget 3000;@target 'self' 3000;endif;pause 200;endwhile;

//edit mana on line two !;while not dead 'self';while paralyzed 'self';pause 50;endwhile;while mana < 40;useskill 'meditation';pause 2500;endwhile;if diffhits > 50;if not buffexists 'Gift of Renewal';cast "Gift of Renewal";waitfortarget 3500;target 'self';endif;endif;//Set Goal;if skill 'Spellweaving' == 120;stop;endif;if skill 'Spellweaving' >= 0 and skill 'Spellweaving' < 24;cast 'Arcane Circle';endif;if skill 'Spellweaving' >= 24 and skill 'Spellweaving' < 44;cast 'Reaper Form';endif;if skill 'Spellweaving' >= 44 and skill 'Spellweaving' < 60;cast 'Summon Fey';if @findtype 0x80 'any' 'world';waitforcontext 'found' 138 1500;endif;endif;if skill 'Spellweaving' >= 60 and skill 'Spellweaving' < 74;cast 'Essence of Wind';endif;if skill 'Spellweaving' >= 74 and skill 'Spellweaving' < 90;cast 'Wildfire';endif;if skill 'Spellweaving' >= 90 and skill 'Spellweaving' <= 120;if diffhits < 50;cast 'Word of Death';endif;endif;waitfortarget 200;pause 200;target 'self' 3500;pause 250;endwhile;
useskill 'Hiding';
useobject 'last';

setalias 'towns1' 0x42a0fb42;setalias 'other' 0x437ae9a5;@clearjournal;while not dead 'self';// Towns 1 (Trammel);if @injournal 'new haven go';@useobject 'towns1';waitforgump 0x59 2000;@replygump 0x59 100;@clearjournal;pause 15000;elseif @injournal 'skara brae go';useobject 'towns1';waitforgump 0x59 2000;replygump 0x59 101;@clearjournal;pause 15000;// Other;elseif @injournal 'moongate go';useobject 'other';waitforgump 0x59 2000;replygump 0x59 100;@clearjournal;pause 15000;elseif @injournal 'inn go';useobject 'other';waitforgump 0x59 2000;replygump 0x59 101;@clearjournal;pause 15000;endif;pause 100;endwhile;

promptalias 'target';@createtimer 'drop';@settimer 'drop' 1000;@createtimer 'feed_timer';@settimer 'feed_timer' 1800001;@removelist 'food';@createlist 'food';@pushlist 'food' 0x97b // Fish Steak;@pushlist 'food' 0x9f2 // Cut of ribs;@pushlist 'food' 0x9b7 // Bird;@pushlist 'food' 0x9d2 // Peach;@pushlist 'food' 0x9d0 // Apple;@pushlist 'food' 0x9d1 // Grape;@pushlist 'food' 0x97d // Cheese;@pushlist 'food' 0x9d3 // Ham;//@pushlist 'food' 0x9c0 // Sausage;@pushlist 'food' 0x9eb // Muffins;@pushlist 'food' 0x1f9d // Muffins;while not dead 'self';// Every 30 mins;if timer 'feed_timer' > 1800000;for 0 to 15;@cast 'Create Food';pause 1500;endfor;pause 1000;feed 'target' 0x9c0 'any' 1;pause 1000;settimer 'feed_timer' 0;endif;@useskill 'Discordance';pause 500;waitfortarget 2000;@target 'target' 1000;if @injournal 'What instrument';if @findtype 0xe9c 'any' 'backpack';@target 'found';pause 900;@clearjournal;endif;endif;if @injournal 'You play jarring' or @injournal 'already in discord';@clearjournal;@cast 'invisibility';waitfortarget 3500;@target 'self' 2000;pause 15000;endif;for 0 in 'food';while @findtype food[] 'any' 'backpack';if @timer 'drop' > 750;@moveitemoffset 'found' 'ground' 0 1 0;@settimer 'drop' 0;break;endif;endwhile;endfor;endwhile;

while not dead 'self';if @injournal 'What instrument';@usetype 0xe9c 'any' 'backpack';@clearjournal;pause 500;endif;pause 1000;cast 'Tribulation';pause 2000;target 'self' 5000;pause 2000;cast 'Tribulation';pause 2000;if mana < 15;while mana != maxmana;pause 100;useskill 'Meditation';pause 4500;endwhile;endif;endwhile;

while not dead 'self';if skill 'Musicianship' >= 100.0;@setskill 'Musicianship' 'locked';playmacro 'SKG Discord Mastery';stop;endif;if @findtype 0xe9c 'any' 'backpack';useobject 'found';pause 770;endif;endwhile;
while not dead 'self';if skill 'Animal Lore' == 115.0;setskill 'Animal Lore' 'locked';endif;useskill 'animal lore';waitfortarget 200;target 0x3a1fd6c;pause 100;endwhile;

//edit mana on line two !;while not dead 'self';while paralyzed 'self';pause 50;endwhile;while mana < 40;useskill 'meditation';pause 2500;endwhile;//Set Goal;if skill 'Magery' == 120;stop;endif;if skill 'Magery' >= 0 and skill 'Magery' < 30;cast 'Cunning';endif;if skill 'Magery' >= 30 and skill 'Magery' < 40;cast 'Bless';endif;if skill 'Magery' >= 40 and skill 'Magery' < 55;cast 'Mana Drain';endif;if skill 'Magery' >= 55 and skill 'Magery' < 65;cast 'Paralyze';endif;if skill 'Magery' >= 65 and skill 'Magery' < 75;cast 'Invisibility';endif;if skill 'Magery' >= 75 and skill 'Magery' <= 100;cast 'Mana Vampire';endif;waitfortarget 200;pause 200;target 'self';pause 250;endwhile;
if @findtype 0xe79 0 'backpack';cast 'Magic Trap';waitfortarget 2500;target 'found' 500;headmsg 'pouch' 65 'found';endif;
